ISI.Description: Inter-stimulus interval (temporal gap between bar stimuli)

trial_type.Description: Categorical code referring to stimulus condition

trial_name.Description: Description of the stimulus category that was shown during this experiment (see trial_type)

stim_file.Description: Name of the stimulus mat file that was shown during this trial of the experiment

stim_file_index.Description: Index of the stimulus in the images field of the stimulus mat file
